name: Across the World
overview:
Across the World is Sammy's driving redemption game which requires players to use the steering wheel to control a car driving down the road. Players win a prize every time, and the better the player drives, the better prize they will receive.

The game features a multi-coin mechanism, an easy-to-move steering wheel, a prize-every-time option and adjustable sound and percentage control. Players drive over country flags to score points and may win a large prize when they reach their target score.
